channel.title: Data Layer on Iguazio MLOps Platform Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Data Layer on Iguazio MLOps Platform Documentation

item.title: Getting Started with Data Ingestion Using Spark
item.description: Overview You can use the Apache Spark open-source data engine to work with data in the platform. This tutorial demonstrates how to run Spark jobs for reading and writing data in different formats (converting the data format), and for running SQL queries on the data. For more information about Spark, see the Spark v3.1.2 quick-start guide. Before You Begin To follow this tutorial, you must first ingest some data, such as a CSV or Parquet file, into the platform (i.

item.title: Ingesting and Preparing Data
item.description: Learn about different methods for ingesting data into the MLOps Platform, analyzing the data, and preparing it for the next step in your data pipeline. NoteA version of this tutorial is available also as a README notebook and Markdown file in the data-ingestion-and-preparation directory of the platform's tutorial Jupyter notebooks, which also contains most of the tutorial notebooks referenced in this tutorial. After reading the tutorial, review and run from a Jupyter Notebook service the tutorial notebooks that are most relevant to your development needs.
